name: generate-image-blog-post
description: Generate an image for a blog post
prompt: I would like to create an image from the template image available in this file %TEMPLATE% integrating these elements: - replace 'Writer Name' by %NAME%  - replace 'Post title' by %TITLE%. Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the second white square by the photo from this %Z_PHOTO% file. Please don't modify the name of the author and the title of the blog post.

Please center this title and use 2 lines at maximum. - replace the first white square by the logo of the conference (in file1). - replace the second white square by the speaker photo (file2). Please don't modify the name of the author and the title of the talk.
